TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but the Deep Space Kraken escapes KSP and enters the real world, and attacks the ship that is going to mars.

I wish people would post more often (It gets lonely ).

True, but it's only me and all my posts are banned by mods for not relating to KSP or being over-sexualized *glares at Ted and shakes fist*

I wish for a softer bed *flops on it and naps*

True, but you sink into it and it is endless.

I wish for a sammich.

Granted, but whoever is delivering it messes up and gives you a sandwich.

I want to own the Hubble!

Granted, you now own an antiquated and outdated scrapheap that is going to be deorbited soon

I wish I owned the James Webb Space Telescope

Granted. It just appeared right above your house and fell through it.

I wish to own the ISS.

Granted, but it gets an orbit inside the atmosphere, and tears it self apart.

I wish i had human space program on my computer.

Granted, but it is confiscated by the government for "national security", but in reality they just want to play the game because it is the best thing since internet cats.

I wish that I owned the internet.

Granted, but all of it is downloaded to your brain.

I wish for cheese.

*hurls a a cheese wheel at your face*

I wish for a V2

Granted, but you get charged with possession of weapons of mass destruction.

I wish to be on mars inside a outpost, with pently of oxegen, water and food.

Granted, but the water contains a virus trapped in the martian ice for thousands of years, and you get infected by it when the base's water filter breaks. The infection trys to infect other people at the base and get back to Earth where it can use the water there to infect everyone, but one of the astronauts blows the base up to trap the virus on mars. The base was called Bowie Base 1. (This is all a blatant reference, but kudos to whoever gets it )

I wish that I had Iron Man armor.

Granted. It's rusty

I wish for a Tardis.

Also (An Original Name), I hated that episode of Doctor Who.

Granted. It's rusty.

(See what I did there?)

I wish for iron.

Granted. It's rusty.

I wish for nasa to make me an astronaut.

Granted, but your spacesuit is rusty.

I wish for oxidized iron.

Granted, it's rusty. DO HO HO HO HO HO~!!!

I wish for stainless steel

Granted it's rusty. Don't ask how.

I wish for this rusty thing to stop.

Granted, but the thread becomes rusty.

I wish I knew how to C#.

Granted, but before you can apply your skills you turn into a cat. (Anyone see what I did?)

I wish to be an astronaut in a working suit, with plenty of air, doing an EVA in LEO with no technical malfunctions or problems of any kind.

Granted. You suffer a fatel heart attck.

I wish cancer was cured.

Granted, but the cure also unknowingly causes a new disease called kancer, which makes all of the cells in your body do a little tap dance routine. You spontaneously explode when that happens.

I wish that I could draw better.

Granted, we then duel to the death

I wish I had a functioning Mercury-Redstone rocket

Granted, and it functions for approximately 1.45 billionths of a second. To make it work again, you will have to find more of its power source: Redstone, which all Mercury-Redstone rockets now require to operate. Good luck in finding any in this dimension

I wish that I had a mini Minecraft pocket dimension.

Granted, but it's so mini it only works on calculators (And they have the worst graphics)

I wish for someone to make a better spore.
